root.Summary: 1: Calura E, Bisognin A, Manzoni M, Todoerti K, Taiana E, Sales G, Morgan GJ,Tonon G, Amodio N, Tassone P, Neri A, Agnelli L, Romualdi C, Bortoluzzi S.Disentangling the microRNA regulatory milieu in multiple myeloma: integrativegenomics analysis outlines mixed miRNA-TF circuits and pathway-derived networksmodulated in t(4;14) patients. Oncotarget. 2015 Oct 19. doi:10.18632/oncotarget.6151. [Epub ahead of print] PubMed PMID: 26496024.
